name: Ronald W
description: I am a family oriented type of person,I am an easy going man who believes that a smile is an inexpensive way to improve your looks. I have a friendly sense of humor already knowing that… no matter how serious your life requires you to be, everyone needs a friend to act goofy with. i love social outings, adventure and view of nature.I would describe myself as stable and goal-oriented.When I’m with someone special I like being spontaneous, adventurous, romantic, surprising them with little gestures, sensual, playful, and basically having fun.I like to be around cultures that are different from my own. I enjoy good food, wine, music and conversation fused all together or apart the outdoors the indoors as long as the company is favorable.
